value.name: Da Recall Election To Be Held Sept. 14 Following Supes Approval
value.description: The Sonoma County Board of Supervisors voted Tuesday to formally set a date for the recall election of District Attorney Jill Ravitch. The election will be held Sept. 14, and prospective candidates must file declaration of candidacy forms by 5 p.
